tr.td: Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceRequest.replaces` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. div.p: Group 3 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceRequest|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `DeviceRequest.doNotPerform` has a context of DeviceRequest based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceRequest`.
Element `DeviceRequest.quantity` has a context of DeviceRequest based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceRequest`.
Element `DeviceRequest.asNeeded` has a context of DeviceRequest based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceRequest`.
Element `DeviceRequest.asNeededFor` has a context of DeviceRequest based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceRequest`.
